positioning.primary: AI innovation partner for global brands
positioning.secondary: Marketing transformation agency that helps global brands accelerate performance through strategy, creativity and capability
positioning.differentiation: Deep strategic thinking combined with practical implementation support

ai_specific.ai_literacy: Build a shared understanding so your team can learn, grow and move forward together
ai_specific.breakthrough_innovation: Use AI to solve problems, spark ideas and design better products and services
ai_specific.strategic_growth: Build a future-ready strategy that drives business growth and inspires your team

approach.philosophy: Provide clarity, confidence, and capability in AI adoption
approach.style: Collaborative with leadership teams, hands-on practical implementation

not_like: Large global management consultancies (McKinsey, BCG, etc.)
unique_strengths: Brighton-based boutique with global brand experience
Deep AI expertise with practical business application
Marketing transformation heritage with AI innovation focus
Leadership team with 15+ years digital transformation experience

target_market.primary: Global brands and enterprises ready for AI transformation
target_market.secondary: Scale-ups and mid-market companies seeking AI strategy
target_market.decision_makers: CMOs, CDOs, Innovation Directors, C-suite executives

brand_voice.tone: Expert but approachable, strategic but practical
messaging_themes: Turn AI potential into business reality
